page.title: 01General Review,Yeovil.
page.content: Our D Block contains a wide valley running E-W,with ground gently rising from about 120 to 300 ft.above sea level on the northern slope,& a steeper rise to 300 ft.on the southern side.A big portion of the town lies in the E of the Block,which then stretches away westward & southward to enclose urban parkland,residential areas,an aircraft factory & airfield,& eventually farmland. Yeovil is a market town. {Notable Features.} The Hospital-A'tower block',opened '75 Livestock Market. Ninesprings-Wooded Park & Lakes. St. John's Parish Church. Street Market. Queensway- A N-S link road bypassing town centre. Westland Helicopter Factory & Airfield.
